Producer: Michel Franco, Duncan Montgomery, Eréndira Núñez Larios, Alex Orlovsky
Production Co: Screen 1, Teorema Films, The Match Factory, High Frequency Entertainment, MUBI, Case Study Films
Synopsis: Sylvia (Jessica Chastain) is a social worker who leads a simple and structured life: her daughter, her job, her AA meetings. This is blown open when Saul (Peter Sarsgaard) follows her home from their high school reunion. Their surprise encounter will profoundly impact both of them as they open the door to the past.
Title: Memory
